21010011.name: Training Broadblade
21010011.ad: This broadblade is designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

21010012.name: Tyro Broadblade
21010012.ad: The onset of pinnacle pursuit. A broadblade designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

21010013.name: Broadblade of Night
21010013.description: When Intro Skill is released, increases ATK by 8%, lasting for 10s.
21010013.ad: May victory prevail the lasting night. In addition to the sworn oath of protection, this broadblade also carries the resolution of those fighting souls.

21010015.name: Lustrous Razor
21010015.description: Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%. When Resonance Skill is released, increases Resonance Liberation DMG by 7%, stacking up to 2 times. This effect lasts for 12s.
21010015.ad: Gaze upon this Broadblade, its sharp edges glistening in the frigid air. As you wield it, you feel the power coursing through like a frozen river.

21010016.name: Verdant Summit
21010016.description: Increases the DMG Bonus of all Resonance Attributes by 12%. Every time Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation is cast, increases Heavy Attack DMG Bonus by 24%, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 14s.
21010016.ad: The ancient mountain stands tall, its peak reaching towards the sky. A river flows for thousands of years, forming the blade of a powerful weapon. As it is unsheathed, a powerful dragon's roar echoes through the heavens and earth, causing the sea to churn. This awe-inspiring weapon strikes fear in all who witness its might.

21010023.name: Originite: Type I
21010023.description: When Resonance Skill is released, restores HP by 3%. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 12s.
21010023.ad: A mass-produced broadblade model developed in Huanglong. Codename: Order.

21010024.name: Discord
21010024.description: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Concerto Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time every 20s.
21010024.ad: A descending adagio. This broadblade dominates the battlefield with the power of discordance. The curtain never falls on a masterpiece.

21010034.name: Broadblade#41
21010034.description: When the Resonator's HP is above 80%, increases ATK by 12%. When the Resonator's HP is below 40%, restores their HP by 5% for dealing Basic Attack DMG or Heavy Attack DMG. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 8s.
21010034.ad: Improved version of a mass-produced broadblade model developed in Huanglong. With its formidable performance and innovative technologies, this broadblade carries a weight only to be wielded by seasoned warriors.

21010043.name: Broadblade of Voyager
21010043.description: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
21010043.ad: The Broadblade provided by the Pioneer Association for the explorers is brightly colored, not easy to lose, hard in texture, and can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, and is very popular among the explorers.

21010044.name: Dauntless Evernight
21010044.description: When Intro Skill is released, increases ATK by 8% and DEF by 15%, lasting for 15s.
21010044.ad: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' preparedness. "Autumn fades in endless nights, ready blades gleam with silent might."

21010053.name: Guardian Broadblade
21010053.description: Increases Basic Attack DMG and Heavy Attack DMG by 12%.
21010053.ad: The first Jinzhou Magistrate, in memory of the mysterious person who helped defend the border and build the city, created the Guardian series under his guidance. Today, it has become an indispensable cornerstone in the development of new weapons.

21010064.name: Helios Cleaver
21010064.description: Within 12s after Resonance Skill is released, increases ATK by 3% every 2s, stacking up to 4 time(s). When the number of stacks reaches 12, all stacks will be reset within 1s.
21010064.ad: The Broadblade born from the aerial phenomenon. The blacksmith incorporates the feelings of witnessing the alien star into the weapon, making it look hollow and light, but it can exert the invincible gravity of the starfall.

21010074.name: Autumntrace
21010074.description: Increases ATK by 4% upon dealing Basic Attack DMG or Heavy Attack DMG, stacking up to 5 time(s). This effect lasts for 7s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 1s.
21010074.ad: This Broadblade is a ceremonial weapon used by the Jinzhou Magistrate of the Huanglong province at the inauguration ceremony. The golden ginkgo leaf pattern represents that Huanglong should be like ginkgo, although it is left alone in the world, it is still prosperous and long-lasting.

21020011.name: Training Sword
21020011.ad: This sword is designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

21020012.name: Tyro Sword
21020012.ad: The birth of revolutionary tides. A sword designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

21020013.name: Sword of Night
21020013.description: When Intro Skill is released, increases ATK by 8%, lasting for 10s.
21020013.ad: May victory prevail the lasting night. In addition to the sworn oath of protection, this sword also represents the ambition of those brave souls.

21020015.name: Emerald of Genesis
21020015.description: Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%. When Resonance Skill is released, increases ATK by 6%, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s.
21020015.ad: Pay heed: the frigid blade reveals an icy current that amalgamates into a whirlpool of thoughts. Use this powerful sequence to crush your enemies with ease using the Sword.

21020023.name: Originite: Type II
21020023.description: When Resonance Liberation is released, restores HP by 5%. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
21020023.ad: A mass-produced sword model developed in Huanglong. Codename: Edged.

21020024.name: Scale: Slasher
21020024.description: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Concerto Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time every 20s.
21020024.ad: An ascending crescendo. This enchanting sword effortlessly cuts through anything in its way, like a glorious prelude.

21020034.name: Sword#18
21020034.description: When Equipped Resonator's HP drops below 40%, increases Heavy Attack DMG by 18% and restores HP by 5% upon dealing Heavy Attack DMG. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 8s.
21020034.ad: Improved version of a mass-produced sword model developed in Huanglong. With its sleek blade and minimalist design, this sword is exclusively crafted for the skilled hands of seasoned warriors.

21020043.name: Sword of Voyager
21020043.description: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
21020043.ad: The Sword provided by the Pioneer Association for the voyagers is bright in color, not easy to lose, hard in texture, and can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, and is very popular among the group of explorers.

21020044.name: Commando of Conviction
21020044.description: When Intro Skill is released, increases ATK by 15%, lasting for 15s.
21020044.ad: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' courage. "A thousand echoes carry the war's tale, as spirits unite in resounding gorges of valor.‚Äù

21020053.name: Guardian Sword
21020053.ad: The first Jinzhou Magistrate, in memory of the mysterious person who helped defend the border and build the city, created the Guardian series under his guidance. Today, it has become an indispensable cornerstone for the development of new weapons.

21020064.name: Lunar Cutter
21020064.description: Equipped Resonator gains 6 stack(s) of Oath upon entering the battlefield. Each stack increases ATK by 2%, up to 6 stacks. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 12s.  Oath reduces by 1 stack(s) every 2s. Equipped Resonator gains an additional 6 stack(s) of Oath upon defeating an enemy.
21020064.ad: The Sword born from the aerial phenomenon. The forger integrates the feelings of witnessing the alien star into the weapon, making it look light and sharp, but it can exert the energy of breaking the sky and cutting iron like mud.

21020074.name: Lumingloss
21020074.description: When Resonance Skill is released, increases Basic Attack DMG and Heavy Attack DMG by 20%, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 1s.
21020074.ad: This Sword is a ceremonial weapon used by the Jinzhou Magistrate of Huanglong at the inauguration ceremony. The golden ginkgo leaf pattern represents that Huanglong should be like ginkgo, although it is left in the world, it is still prosperous and long-lasting.

21030011.name: Training Pistols
21030011.ad: These pistols are designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

21030012.name: Tyro Pistols
21030012.ad: The inception of valiant venture. A pair of pistols designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

21030013.name: Pistols of Night
21030013.description: When Intro Skill is released, increases ATK by 8%, lasting for 10s.
21030013.ad: May victory prevail the lasting night. This type of pistols not only carries the oath of protection but also contains the hope of rejuvenation.

21030015.name: Static Mist
21030015.description: Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%. When Outro Skill is released, increases the switched-in Resonator's ATK by 10%, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 14s.
21030015.ad: Grip the sleek frame and feel its cool surface as you aim down the sight. With a pull of the trigger, unleash a thick smoke barrage onto the battlefield with these powerful Pistols in your hands.

21030023.name: Originite: Type III
21030023.description: When Counter Attack is released, restores HP by 1.6%. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.
21030023.ad: To develop new Tacetite weapons, Huaxu Academy has built a test-type Pistols for the purpose of technical verification. In addition to the impressive weapon performance, the biggest feature is that it can enhance the physical activity of the Resonator to heal wounds through attacks.

21030024.name: Cadenza
21030024.description: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Concerto Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time every 20s.
21030024.ad: An ascending crescendo. These pistols unleash bullets with the force of thunder, tearing through the heavens like a symphony of destruction.

21030034.name: Pistols#26
21030034.description: When the Resonator takes no damage, increases ATK by 6% every 5s, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s. When the Resonator takes damage, reduces the number of stacks by 1 and restores their HP by 5%.
21030034.ad: The Huaxu Academy has independently improved and developed the first highly practical high-performance Pistols based on the previous source energy weapons, representing the Academy's meticulous research and pointing directly to the profound.

21030043.name: Pistols of Voyager
21030043.description: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
21030043.ad: The Pistols provided by the Pioneer Association for the far walkers, with bright colors, not easy to lose, hard texture, can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, and is very popular among the explorer group.

21030044.name: Undying Flame
21030044.description: When Intro Skill is released, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by 20% for 15s.
21030044.ad: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' dedication. "Let my body ablaze, flames dance to banish all evil's haze."

21030053.name: Guardian Pistols
21030053.description: Increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by 12%.
21030053.ad: The first Jinzhou Magistrate, in memory of the mysterious person who helped defend the border and build the city, created the Guardian series under his guidance. Now, it has become the cornerstone of the development of new weapons.

21030064.name: Novaburst
21030064.description: When the Resonator dashes or dodges, increases ATK by 4%, stacking up to 3 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s.
21030064.ad: Pistols born from the strange phenomena in the sky. The forger infused the weapon with the feelings from witnessing the strange star, making it look hollow and light, yet extremely stable, with the power of thunder when it fires.

21030074.name: Thunderbolt
21030074.description: When hitting a target with Basic Attacks or Heavy Attacks, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by 7%, stacking up to 3 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 1s.
21030074.ad: These Pistols are ceremonial weapons used in the inauguration ceremony of the Jinzhou Magistrate of Huanglong. The golden ginkgo leaf pattern represents that Huanglong should be like the ginkgo, although it is left in the world, it is still thriving.

21040011.name: Training Gauntlets
21040011.ad: These gauntlets are designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

21040012.name: Tyro Gauntlets
21040012.ad: The dawn of enduring endeavor. A pair of gauntlets designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

21040013.name: Gauntlets of Night
21040013.description: When Intro Skill is released, increases ATK by 8%, lasting for 10s.
21040013.ad: May victory prevail the lasting night. In addition to the sworn oath of protection, these gauntlets also commemorates the sacrifices of those brave souls.

21040015.name: Abyss Surges
21040015.description: Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%. When hitting a target with Resonance Skill, increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus by 10%, lasting for 8s. When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by 10%, lasting for 8s.
21040015.ad: The Gauntlets pulsate with an uncontrollable force, emanating unspeakable anger from the depths of the unknown lake. As you don them, unleash your fury on helpless enemies. Feel its power surge through you.

21040023.name: Originite: Type IV
21040023.description: When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, restores HP by 0.5%. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 3s.
21040023.ad: To develop new Tacetite weapons, the Huaxu Academy has built a test-type Gauntlets for the purpose of technical verification. In addition to the impressive weapon performance, the biggest feature is that it can enhance the physical activity of the Resonator to heal wounds through attacks.

21040024.name: Marcato
21040024.description: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Concerto Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time every 20s.
21040024.ad: A descending adagio. These gauntlets pulsate with the power of surging waves, shattering anything in their path like a deadly hymn.

21040034.name: Gauntlets#21D
21040034.description: When the Resonator dashes or dodges, increases ATK by 8%. Increases Counter Attack DMG by 50%, lasting for 8s. When Counter Attack is performed, restores the Resonator's HP by 5%. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.
21040034.ad: Huaxu Academy has independently improved and developed the first set of highly practical high-performance Gauntlets based on the previous source energy weapons, representing the care and warmth of the Academy, stable and lasting.

21040043.name: Gauntlets of Voyager
21040043.description: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
21040043.ad: The Gauntlets provided by the Pioneer Association for the far walkers, with bright colors, not easy to lose, hard texture, can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, and are very popular among the explorer group.

21040044.name: Amity Accord
21040044.description: When Intro Skill is released, increases Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus by 20%, lasting for 15s.
21040044.ad: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' comradeship. "Thin garments yield to icy moons, while armor withstands the chill of stars."

21040053.name: Guardian Gauntlets
21040053.description: Increases Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus by 12%.
21040053.ad: The first Jinzhou Magistrate, in memory of the mysterious person who helped defend the border and build the city, created the Guardian series under his guidance. Today, it has become an indispensable cornerstone in the development of new weapons.

21040064.name: Hollow Mirage
21040064.description: When Resonance Liberation is released, grants 3 stack(s) of Iron Armor. Each stack increases ATK and DEF by 3%, stacking up to 3 time(s). When the Resonator takes damage, reduces the number of stacks by 1.
21040064.ad: The Gauntlets born from the strange phenomenon in the sky. The blacksmith infused the feelings of witnessing the strange star into the weapon, making it look hollow and light, but it can exert a tremendous momentum while protecting the user.

21040074.name: Stonard
21040074.description: When Resonance Skill is released, increases the caster's Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus by 18%, lasting for 15s.
21040074.ad: These Gauntlets are ceremonial weapon used at the inauguration ceremony of the Huanglong Magistrate. The golden ginkgo leaf pattern represents that Huanglong should be like a ginkgo, although it is left alone in the world, it is still prosperous and long-lasting.

21050011.name: Training Rectifier
21050011.ad: This rectifier is designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

21050012.name: Tyro Rectifier
21050012.ad: The origin of universal genesis. A Rectifier designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

21050013.name: Rectifier of Night
21050013.description: When Intro Skill is released, increases ATK by 8%, lasting for 10s.
21050013.ad: May victory prevail the lasting night. In addition to the sworn oath of protection, this rectifier signifies the confidence of those fighting souls.

21050015.name: Cosmic Ripples
21050015.description: Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%. When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus by 3.2%, stacking up to 5 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 0.5s.
21050015.ad: Take hold of the frozen Rectifier, a powerful tool imbued with the energy of the celestial lake. Let it lead you to ultimate knowledge and vanquish all obstacles in your path.

21050016.name: Stringmaster
21050016.description: Increases the DMG Bonus of all Resonance Attributes by 12%. When Resonance Skill hits a target, increases ATK by 12%, stacking up to 2. When the equipped character is not on the field, increases their ATK by an additional 12%.
21050016.ad: As the puppet palm unfurls, deadly strings are unleashed with a menacing hum. The air crackles with power, immobilizing any foes caught in its grasp. The rapid bolts of electricity leave unhealable scars on their victims.

21050023.name: Originite: Type V
21050023.description: When Intro Skill is released, restores HP by 5%. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
21050023.ad: A rectifier model mass-produced in Huanglong. Codename: Chrono.

21050024.name: Variation
21050024.description: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Concerto Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time every 20s.
21050024.ad: A descending adagio. This rectifier opens up an insightful window into the situation, changing the tune of the intense battle concerto.

21050034.name: Rectifier#25
21050034.description: When Resonance Skill is released, if the Resonator's HP is below 60%, restores their HP by 5%. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 8s; if the Resonator's HP is above 60%, increases ATK by 12%, lasting for 10s.
21050034.ad: Improved version of a Rectifier prototype from the Huanglong next-gen mass production weaponry project. With surging power and highly purified lens, its sound is only played by the wise of steel-like will.

21050043.name: Rectifier of Voyager
21050043.description: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
21050043.ad: The Rectifier provided by the Pioneer Association for the explorers, with bright colors, not easy to lose, hard texture, can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, is very popular among the explorers.

21050044.name: Jinzhou Keeper
21050044.description: When Intro Skill is released, increases the caster's ATK by 8% and HP by 10%, lasting for 15s.
21050044.ad: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' vigilant protection for Jinzhou. "Cast your gaze towards the north, where the city's silhouette fades, its gates veiled by the tranquil rain."

21050053.name: Guardian Rectifier
21050053.description: Increases Basic Attack and Heavy Attack DMG Bonus by 12%.
21050053.ad: The first Jinzhou Magistrate, in memory of the mysterious person who helped defend the border and build the city, created the Guardian series under his guidance. Today, it has become an indispensable cornerstone for the development of new weapons.

21050064.name: Comet Flare
21050064.description: When hitting a target with Basic Attacks or Heavy Attacks, increases Healing Bonus by 3%, stacking up to 3 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 0.6s.
21050064.ad: The Rectifier born from the aerial phenomenon. The forger integrates the feelings of witnessing the alien stars into the weapon, making it look delicate and light, but it can be stable and constant, and it can be responsive.

21050074.name: Augment
21050074.description: When Resonance Liberation is released, increases the caster's ATK by 15%, lasting for 15s.
21050074.ad: This Rectifier is a ceremonial weapon used by the Jinzhou Magistrate of Huanglong at the inauguration ceremony. The golden ginkgo leaf pattern represents that Huanglong should be like ginkgo, although it is left alone in the world, it is still prosperous and long-lasting.
